content: And treasure my commands within you,
So that you incline your ear to wisdom,
Yes, if you cry out for discernment,
lift up your voice for understanding,
If you seek her as silver,
And search for her as  hidden treasures;
Then you will understand the fear of the ,
And find the knowledge of God.
From His mouth  knowledge and understanding;
He stores up sound wisdom for the upright;
a shield to those who walk uprightly;
He guards the paths of justice,
And preserves the way of His saints.
Then you will understand righteousness and justice,
